mchorse.mappet.api.scripts.user.entities

Interface IScriptNpc

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IScriptEntity

    public interface IScriptNpc
extends IScriptEntity
    Mappet's NPC entity interface. 
    
    function main(c)
    {
        if (c.getSubject().isNpc())
        {
            // Do something with the NPC...
        }
    }

    • Method Detail

      • getMappetNpc

        EntityNpc getMappetNpc()
        Get Mappet entity NPC instance. BEWARE: you need to know the MCP mappings in order to directly call methods on this instance!

        But some methods might have human readable method names. Please check EntityNpc class for methods that don't have Override annotation!

      • getNpcId

        java.lang.String getNpcId()
        Get NPC's NPC ID. 
        
    var pos = c.getSubject().getPosition();
    var npc = c.getWorld().spawnNpc("test", pos.x, pos.y + 2, pos.z);

    // This will output "true" as long as you have an NPC configured
    // in Mappet's NPC dashboard panel
    c.send(npc.getNpcId() === "test");

      • getNpcState

        java.lang.String getNpcState()
        Get NPC's state. 
        
    c.send(c.getSubject().getNpcState());

        stateId - state ID

        void canPickUpLoot(boolean canPickUpLoot)
        Make NPC can pick up stuff.

        Parameters:
        canPickUpLoot - true if NPC can pick up stuff, false otherwise

      • follow

        void follow(java.lang.String target)
        Make NPC follow a target. 
        
    c.getSubject().follow("@r");
        Parameters:
        target - Target to follow (can be a player name, @r)

      • setOnTickTrigger

        void setOnTickTrigger(java.lang.String scriptName,
                      java.lang.String functionName,
                      int frequency,
                      int blockIndex)
        Sets NPC's tick trigger (Use this if you want to edit an existing `on tick trigger`). 
        
    c.getSubject().setOnTickTrigger("ScriptName", "FunctionName", 1, 0);
        Parameters:
        scriptName - Script name
        functionName - Function name
        frequency - Frequency
        blockIndex - Block number

      • addOnTickTrigger

                      java.lang.String functionName,
                      int frequency)
        Adds a new `on tick trigger` to the NPC. 
        
    c.getSubject().addOnTickTrigger("ScriptName", "FunctionName", 1);
        Parameters:
        scriptName - Script name
        functionName - Function name
        frequency - Frequency

        void setPatrol(int x,
               int y,
               int z,

               int patrolIndex)
        Sets NPC's patrol point with a script trigger.

        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate
        y - Y coordinate
        z - Z coordinate
        scriptName - Script name
        functionName - Function name
        patrolIndex - Patrol index
